rows.title: CVE-2024-45678 - Remote Code Execution in Apache Struts
rows.description: A critical remote code execution vulnerability exists in Apache Struts 2.5.30 and earlier versions. Attackers can execute arbitrary code by sending specially crafted requests.
rows.remediation: Upgrade to Apache Struts 2.5.31 or later. Apply the security patch immediately for internet-facing services.

rows.title: SQL Injection in User Authentication
rows.description: User input is directly concatenated into SQL query without proper sanitization, allowing SQL injection attacks.
rows.remediation: Use parameterized queries or prepared statements. Replace string concatenation with ORM methods or bound parameters.

rows.title: CVE-2024-23456 - Authentication Bypass in Spring Security
rows.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Spring Security allows attackers to access protected resources without proper credentials.
rows.remediation: Upgrade to Spring Security 5.7.11 or 6.1.5. Review authentication configuration and test access controls.

rows.title: Hardcoded Credentials in Configuration
rows.description: Database credentials are hardcoded in configuration file, posing a security risk if the repository is compromised.
rows.remediation: Move credentials to environment variables or a secure secrets management system like HashiCorp Vault or AWS Secrets Manager.

rows.title: S3 Bucket Publicly Accessible
rows.description: S3 bucket 'customer-data-prod' is configured with public read access, exposing sensitive customer data.
rows.remediation: Remove public access configuration. Set bucket policy to private and use IAM roles for access control.

rows.title: CVE-2024-34567 - Deserialization Vulnerability in Jackson
rows.description: A critical deserialization vulnerability in Jackson allows remote code execution through malicious JSON payloads.
rows.remediation: Upgrade to Jackson 2.15.3 or later immediately. Review all JSON deserialization endpoints for proper input validation.

rows.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in User Profile
rows.description: User-supplied data is rendered without proper sanitization, allowing XSS attacks through profile fields.
rows.remediation: Use React's built-in XSS protection. Avoid dangerouslySetInnerHTML. Sanitize user input with DOMPurify if HTML rendering is required.

rows.title: CVE-2024-12345 - Path Traversal in Express.js
rows.description: A path traversal vulnerability in Express.js allows attackers to access files outside the intended directory.
rows.remediation: Upgrade to Express.js 4.18.2 or later. Validate and sanitize all file path inputs. Use path.resolve() to prevent directory traversal.

rows.title: Weak Cryptographic Algorithm (MD5)
rows.description: MD5 hashing algorithm is used for password hashing, which is cryptographically weak and vulnerable to collision attacks.
rows.remediation: Replace MD5 with bcrypt, scrypt, or Argon2 for password hashing. Migrate existing password hashes during user login.

rows.title: Security Group Allows All Inbound Traffic
rows.description: Security group 'web-sg' allows inbound traffic from 0.0.0.0/0 on all ports, violating least privilege principle.
rows.remediation: Restrict inbound rules to specific ports (80, 443) and source IP ranges. Remove unrestricted access rules.

rows.title: CVE-2024-56789 - SSRF in Axios HTTP Client
rows.description: Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability in Axios allows attackers to make requests to internal services.
rows.remediation: Upgrade to Axios 1.6.0 or later. Implement URL validation and allowlist for external requests.

rows.title: Command Injection in File Processing
rows.description: User-supplied filename is passed directly to shell command without sanitization, allowing command injection.
rows.remediation: Use parameterized commands or safe APIs. Validate and sanitize all user inputs. Avoid shell execution when possible.
